text: Ezekiase yeezeini ti wu, naa ʋoluma é pɛlɛi wu lɛɛni ga tiye, ʋɛ ná ga ani ɓiigiti makɛsuʋɛ, walii ta zanugi ta tufa maku nɛɛnɛgiti, ta gulɔ maku nɛɛnɛgi. É ná-kɔɔɠɔ zɔɔlaiti puuzuʋɛ ɓalaa lɛ, ta nii kpein makɛga ɠɛni de zea. É la ɠɛni ani nɔpɛ dɔɔɠuni ti ʋa ná-pɛlɛi wu, ta ná-masa zooi zu.
